twitch._comment: Get your Twitch app ID from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps

google._comment: Get your Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID from https://console.cloud.google.com/

_instructions.security: This app uses PKCE (Proof Key for Code Exchange) - no client secrets needed!
setup: 2. Replace YOUR_TWITCH_CLIENT_ID_HERE with your Twitch Client ID
3. Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID_HERE with your Google Client ID
4. That's it! No secrets required with PKCE flow
twitch_setup: 3. Set OAuth Redirect URL to the redirectUri above
4. Copy the Client ID (NOT the secret)
google_setup: 2. Create a new project or select existing
4. Create OAuth 2.0 Client ID (Web application type)
5. Add the redirectUri above to Authorized redirect URIs
6. Copy the Client ID (NOT the secret)
_instructions.note: Client IDs are public and safe to share. PKCE generates dynamic secrets at runtime.
